trans-unit.source: Create the Fourth Coffee application to receive orders and return invoice
trans-unit.target: Create the Fourth Coffee application to receive orders and return invoice

trans-unit.source: In this section, we set up the application that represents the Fourth Coffee restaurant.
trans-unit.target: In this section, we set up the application that represents the Fourth Coffee restaurant.

trans-unit.source: This application reads the X12 850 purchase order sent to the <embeddedLabel>tosupplier</embeddedLabel> Azure blob container, generates the X12 810 invoice in response, and then routes the invoice to the EDI X12 receive bridge that is deployed as part of the X12 agreement.
trans-unit.target: This application reads the X12 850 purchase order sent to the <embeddedLabel>tosupplier</embeddedLabel> Azure blob container, generates the X12 810 invoice in response, and then routes the invoice to the EDI X12 receive bridge that is deployed as part of the X12 agreement.

trans-unit.source: For this tutorial we use a console application that performs these tasks.
trans-unit.target: For this tutorial we use a console application that performs these tasks.

trans-unit.source: Instead of providing instructions on how to create the application, this topic focuses on explaining the <embeddedLabel>SupplierApp</embeddedLabel> sample application that is available to download at <externalLink><linkText>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=390150</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=390150</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: Instead of providing instructions on how to create the application, this topic focuses on explaining the <embeddedLabel>SupplierApp</embeddedLabel> sample application that is available to download at <externalLink><linkText>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=390150</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=390150</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites
trans-unit.target: Prerequisites

trans-unit.source: Ensure that the following requirements are met on the computer where you use the supplier application to process customer orders.
trans-unit.target: Ensure that the following requirements are met on the computer where you use the supplier application to process customer orders.

trans-unit.source: Install the <token>azure_1</token> .NET SDK.
trans-unit.target: Install the <token>azure_1</token> .NET SDK.

trans-unit.source: You can download the SDK from <externalLink><linkText>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=378265</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=378265</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: You can download the SDK from <externalLink><linkText>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=378265</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=378265</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Install the certificate that was used to provision <token>af_integration</token> using the <token>azureportal1</token>.
trans-unit.target: Install the certificate that was used to provision <token>af_integration</token> using the <token>azureportal1</token>.

trans-unit.source: Create a BlobHelper class
trans-unit.target: Create a BlobHelper class

trans-unit.source: The <embeddedLabel>BlobHelper</embeddedLabel> class downloads the blob from the specified container, deletes it after reading, and returns the downloaded data.
trans-unit.target: The <embeddedLabel>BlobHelper</embeddedLabel> class downloads the blob from the specified container, deletes it after reading, and returns the downloaded data.

trans-unit.source: Use an EDI invoice template
trans-unit.target: Use an EDI invoice template

trans-unit.source: This application uses an X12 810 invoice template file to generate the invoice message.
trans-unit.target: This application uses an X12 810 invoice template file to generate the invoice message.

trans-unit.source: The template file, <embeddedLabel>Invoice810.edi</embeddedLabel> is added to the solution under the Data folder.
trans-unit.target: The template file, <embeddedLabel>Invoice810.edi</embeddedLabel> is added to the solution under the Data folder.

trans-unit.source: The application replaces the values in this template to generate the actual 810 invoice that is sent to the customer.
trans-unit.target: The application replaces the values in this template to generate the actual 810 invoice that is sent to the customer.

trans-unit.source: The contents of the template file resemble the following:
trans-unit.target: The contents of the template file resemble the following:

trans-unit.source: This template file is created in concurrence to the agreement we created in the step <link xlink:href="c6f3a867-cf2c-47b4-85be-a1ffc2becd68" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create a Trading Partner Agreement</link>.
trans-unit.target: This template file is created in concurrence to the agreement we created in the step <link xlink:href="c6f3a867-cf2c-47b4-85be-a1ffc2becd68" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create a Trading Partner Agreement</link>.

trans-unit.source: While creating the agreement in your environment, if you specified the values that were different from the ones suggested in the tutorial, you must update the template file accordingly.
trans-unit.target: While creating the agreement in your environment, if you specified the values that were different from the ones suggested in the tutorial, you must update the template file accordingly.

trans-unit.source: For example, in your agreement if you specified a different set of values for the hosted partner and guest partner qualifiers, you must provide the same values in the template file as well.
trans-unit.target: For example, in your agreement if you specified a different set of values for the hosted partner and guest partner qualifiers, you must provide the same values in the template file as well.

trans-unit.source: Create an EdiHelper class
trans-unit.target: Create an EdiHelper class

trans-unit.source: The <embeddedLabel>EdiHelper</embeddedLabel> class generates an X12 810 invoice message in response to the X12 850 purchaser order message downloaded from the blob.
trans-unit.target: The <embeddedLabel>EdiHelper</embeddedLabel> class generates an X12 810 invoice message in response to the X12 850 purchaser order message downloaded from the blob.

trans-unit.source: This uses the <embeddedLabel>Invoice810.edi</embeddedLabel> template file under the project’s Data folder to generate the X12 810 invoice.
trans-unit.target: This uses the <embeddedLabel>Invoice810.edi</embeddedLabel> template file under the project’s Data folder to generate the X12 810 invoice.

trans-unit.source: Create an AcsHelper class
trans-unit.target: Create an AcsHelper class

trans-unit.source: The <embeddedLabel>AcsHelper</embeddedLabel> class creates the ACS authentication tokens required to securely send messages to the EDI receive bridge deployed under the <token>af_integration</token> subscription on <token>azure_2</token>.
trans-unit.target: The <embeddedLabel>AcsHelper</embeddedLabel> class creates the ACS authentication tokens required to securely send messages to the EDI receive bridge deployed under the <token>af_integration</token> subscription on <token>azure_2</token>.

trans-unit.source: Create a PipelineHelper class
trans-unit.target: Create a PipelineHelper class

trans-unit.source: The <embeddedLabel>PipelineHelper</embeddedLabel> class sends the X12 810 invoice message to the EDI X12 receive bridge that is deployed to your <token>af_integration</token> subscription.
trans-unit.target: The <embeddedLabel>PipelineHelper</embeddedLabel> class sends the X12 810 invoice message to the EDI X12 receive bridge that is deployed to your <token>af_integration</token> subscription.

trans-unit.source: Create the Program.cs
trans-unit.target: Create the Program.cs

trans-unit.source: The Program.cs invokes the other helper classes in the following order:
trans-unit.target: The Program.cs invokes the other helper classes in the following order:

trans-unit.source: Calls the <embeddedLabel>DequeueData</embeddedLabel> method in the <embeddedLabel>BlobHelper</embeddedLabel> class and retrieves the message from the <embeddedLabel>toSupplier</embeddedLabel> blob.
trans-unit.target: Calls the <embeddedLabel>DequeueData</embeddedLabel> method in the <embeddedLabel>BlobHelper</embeddedLabel> class and retrieves the message from the <embeddedLabel>toSupplier</embeddedLabel> blob.

trans-unit.source: Calls the <embeddedLabel>GenerateInvoiceMessage</embeddedLabel> method in the <embeddedLabel>EdiHelper</embeddedLabel> class to generate the X12 810 invoice in response.
trans-unit.target: Calls the <embeddedLabel>GenerateInvoiceMessage</embeddedLabel> method in the <embeddedLabel>EdiHelper</embeddedLabel> class to generate the X12 810 invoice in response.

trans-unit.source: Calls the <embeddedLabel>SendToPipeline</embeddedLabel> method in the <embeddedLabel>PipelineHelper</embeddedLabel> class to send the invoice message to the EDI receive bridge.
trans-unit.target: Calls the <embeddedLabel>SendToPipeline</embeddedLabel> method in the <embeddedLabel>PipelineHelper</embeddedLabel> class to send the invoice message to the EDI receive bridge.

trans-unit.source: The <embeddedLabel>PipelineHelper</embeddedLabel> class in turn uses the <embeddedLabel>AcsHelper</embeddedLabel> class to generate the authentication token required to securely send the message to the bridge.
trans-unit.target: The <embeddedLabel>PipelineHelper</embeddedLabel> class in turn uses the <embeddedLabel>AcsHelper</embeddedLabel> class to generate the authentication token required to securely send the message to the bridge.

trans-unit.source: The following code demonstrates this:
trans-unit.target: The following code demonstrates this:

trans-unit.source: Provide the configuration values and run the application
trans-unit.target: Provide the configuration values and run the application

trans-unit.source: All the user-specific values used in this application are specified in the app.config file.
trans-unit.target: All the user-specific values used in this application are specified in the app.config file.

trans-unit.source: You can provide the values as shown here:
trans-unit.target: You can provide the values as shown here:

trans-unit.source: Save all changes to the project, and then build/run the application.
trans-unit.target: Save all changes to the project, and then build/run the application.

trans-unit.source: The application will run infinitely polling the blob container (<embeddedLabel>tosupplier</embeddedLabel>) you specified in the application configuration.
trans-unit.target: The application will run infinitely polling the blob container (<embeddedLabel>tosupplier</embeddedLabel>) you specified in the application configuration.
